item.title: Trouble with my frame writer
item.dc:creator: @Palidino76 Palidino76
item.description:
@Palidino76 wrote:

Ok, I cant figure out how to add " to a frame writer to write out. Heres my code:

public void LogFrames(int Num) {
for(int i = 0; i < Num; i++) {
  BufferedWriter bw = null;

      try {
         bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/frames.txt", true));
	 bw.write("sendFrame126("+i+", "+i+");");
	 bw.newLine();
	 bw.flush();
      } catch (IOException ioe) {
	 ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
	 if (bw != null) try {
	    bw.close();
	 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
	    sendMessage("Error logging frame!");
	 }
      }
   }
}

I need to make it so that the first i has quotes around it, but can’t figure out how.

Read full topic
